Camoflage:
She smiled, "That's ok. If she's in the base, she'll hear me." 
She went over to the wall mounted intercom system and turned the 
volume up all the way. "NIGHTLIGHT! KUP WANTS YOU!"

Any bot who was outside the base  would have heard that loud an clear.

KitKat:
She was in the mess hall when the call when over the loud speakers. 
She grabbed her ears in sheer pain and fell to her knees on the floor.

Wolfblade::
She was holding her glass up when the sonic blast of a child's voice 
rang out.  She let the glass fall to the floor as her hands went up 
to cover her ears. She grimiced and groaned as her audio sensors 
almost blew from the decible overload.

Camoflage::
she turned off the system and smiled at Kup. "OK, she knows you want 
to talk to her now."
